CustomField.description: Indicates if the entity is an importer.- If true, the entity imports a quantity of goods from other countries.- If false, the entity does not import a quantity of goods from other countries.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates if the entity is an importer.- If true, the entity imports a quantity of goods from other countries.- If false, the entity does not import a quantity of goods from other countries.
CustomField.label: Is Importer
